package.name: product_thumbnail_image_slider
package.summary: This is product thumbnail image slider extension for magento and its playing with product thumbnail images.
package.description:
Product thumbnail images slider extension for magento latest version 1.9
its give smoothly sliding effect to product thumbnail images.
Using this extension you can manage multiple image easily
JQuery no conflict added to avoid conflicts with other scripts
Compatible with all modern browser
Lightweight, modern and fast loading slider design.
User can easily install and customize CSS and HTML formatting.
package.notes: this is stable version of product thumbnail image slider
